attributes.action: To give GCSEs there target grades and not teacher assignment based
attributes.additional_details: For me I want to say due to Covid getting in way the amount of time Tution was paid amount of time I didn’t achieve the grade I want from teachers marked assignment were as my target grade 4 would help me as I wouldn’t need to sit a exam instead achieving the grade with my target for me sitting exam is a struggle mentally knowing question instead of making us do a exam give us a book we can sit with we have suffered enough by not achieving the grades we want
attributes.background: To give target grades to GCSEs students 2021 and 2022 due to many people receiving poor teacher based grades and are going mental and suffering from there grades
